body.name: Aveeno Scalp Soothing Fresh Greens Blend Conditioner, peppermint, 12 Fl Oz

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Oat is the first ingredient in this scalp-soothing, thickening, clarifying, farm-fresh inspired shampoo infused with rosemary, peppermint, and cucumber for voluminous, thickened hair
Blended to refresh and add body from root to tip, these farm-to-shower fresh ingredients work together to help promote a healthy scalp environment while enhancing your hair's natural beauty
Sulfate free shampoo, free from dyes and parabens, making it safe for all hair types including color treated hair
We are inspired by nature; our oat is sourced from a small town mill where pride and quality go hand and hand and we do not test our products on animals

Aveeno is a trusted household brand established in 1945 and is best known for its line of skin soothing products, where oat's natural soothing properties are put to work in body, face and scalp applications
body.description: We believe that beautiful hair starts at the root. Soothe your scalp and add volume to your hair with this farm-to-shower inspired Fresh Greens Blend Conditioner. Oat as the first ingredient helps to promote a healthy scalp environment. Infused with rosemary, peppermint and cucumber, this conditioner volumizes, thickens, clarifies and adds light moisture with a cooling fresh experience. The blend of ingredients works to produce a sensational, fresh fragrance. Free from sulfates, parabens and dyes, this product is safe for color-treated hair. We source our oats from a quiet mill located along the rolling hills of the Mississippi River Valley, in a small town where pride and quality go hand-in-hand. We love the way we feel when everything is in balance. That's why we start with oat as the first ingredient. Each blend helps to soothe your scalp and nourish your strands from root to tip. Discover blends made with simple ingredients, from simpler times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This smells good. Not too strong of a scent. Works well with my hair. I stay stocked in Aveeno products. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my hair soft and shiny, makes my scalp feel good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It smells sweet but also perfume like, it's nice. My scalp is no longer itchy and my hair is definitely healthier. Will continue to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work good for me
reviews.reviewText: I read mixed reviews. Some were for the shampoo and some for the conditioner. I am writing about the CONDITIONER. I don’t care for this product. I bought the brand because I like Aveeno lotion. I thought the conditioner sounded good and was a good price. The one I got smells like eucalyptus and not floral as some reviews mentioned. It feels thick and not creamy. Most conditioners I use have a silky smooth feel and leave my hair feeling silky and soft and moisturized. This did not. It’s hard to work it into the hair. For lack of better description it seems to have a lot of drag. I seem to have to use a lot more product to get it worked into my hair and get the coverage I need. My hair doesn’t feel soft or silky. In fact it seemed a lot drier and dead looking. I would not recommend. I have color treated hair which tends to be dry just in case you have similar. This product is not for me. I just colored my hair and used the after color conditioner that comes with the product and I noticed a remarkable improvement in my hair’s texture, silkiness, shine, and manageability. The Aveeno is going in the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need to buy for my colored hair
reviews.reviewText: The smells not to bad there's just a clear color to it. Good quality, my hair feels clean after washing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like heaven
reviews.reviewText: Smells wonderful. Makes your hair silky soft, washes out nicely, with no left over film. And is sulfate free so no allergy issues

reviews.reviewTitle: Limpia muy bien y huele muy bien!
reviews.reviewText: Lo recomiendo. Es fresco, si deja sensación de limpieza y huele muy bien.Sin sulfatos, se puede usar después de un alaciado semi perm

reviews.reviewTitle: My hair has never been this soft for so long.
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner works really really well. My hair feels soft and lush for days after using this (even with washing again). Never had anything very positive to say about conditioners but this is the first product I’ve used where there’s a noticeable difference in my hair. Expensive but worth it.
Lo compre para mi hijo, y hasta el momento no ha habido quedja

The conditioner made my hair dry and while blow drying my hair was going static and was falling out. Although the shampoo was nice the conditioner doesn’t do what it says and leaves your hair feeling dry and brittle like.
